title: Ep 46: Manicurist Madeline Poole on Viral Nail Art Trends
itunes:title: Ep 46: Manicurist Madeline Poole on Viral Nail Art Trends
itunes:subtitle: Madeline "@mpnails" Poole is in the studio to talk manicures, #nailfie tips, and how polish color trends start. We also dream about having a MAC collaboration, give the final word on when (and how) to apply face oil, and discuss the latest ha...
description:
Madeline "@mpnails" Poole is in the studio to talk manicures, #nailfie tips, and how polish color trends start. We also dream about having a MAC collaboration, give the final word on when (and how) to apply face oil, and discuss the latest hair color trend.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
